verses.verse: <S%G846><s%> For Yourselves <S%G1063><s%> Ye Know, <S%G1492><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1529><s%> Our Entrance In <S%G2257><s%> Which We Had <S%G3588><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Void <S%G2756><s%> It Has Been; <S%G1096><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Having Before Suffered <S%G4310><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Been Insulted, <S%G5195><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Ye Know, <S%G1492><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> Philippi, <S%G5375><s%> We Were Bold <S%G3955><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Our God <S%G2257><s%> To Speak <S%G2980><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Conflict. <S%G73><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Exhortation <S%G3874><s%> Our Was <S%G2257><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Error, <S%G4106><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Uncleanness, <S%G167><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Guile; <S%G1388><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> We Have Been Approved <S%G1381><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To Be Entrusted With <S%G4100><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings, <S%G2098><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> We Speak; <S%G2980><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Pleasing, <S%G700><s%> But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Proves <S%G1381><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hearts <S%G2588><s%> Of Us. <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G3777><s%> For Neither <S%G1063><s%> At Any Time <S%G4218><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of Flattery <S%G2850><s%> Were We With You, <S%G1096><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Ye Know, <S%G1492><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> A Pretext <S%G4392><s%> Of Covetousness, <S%G4124><s%> God Is <S%G2316><s%> Witness; <S%G3144><s%>

Nor <S%G3777><s%> Seeking <S%G2212><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Glory, <S%G1391><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Others, Though <S%G243><s%> Having Power <S%G1410><s%> <S%G1722><s%> Burdensome <S%G922><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Christ's <S%G5547><s%> Apostles; <S%G652><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> We Were <S%G1096><s%> Gentle <S%G2261><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> Your Midst <S%G5216><s%> <S%G5613><s%> As <S%G302><s%> A Nurse <S%G5162><s%> Would Cherish <S%G2282><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Her Own <S%G1438><s%> Children. <S%G5043><s%>

Thus <S%G3779><s%> Yearning Over <S%G2442><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> We Were Pleased <S%G2106><s%> To Have Imparted <S%G3330><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Our <S%G3588><s%> Own <S%G1438><s%> Lives, <S%G5590><s%> Because <S%G1360><s%> Beloved <S%G27><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> Ye Have Become. <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G3421><s%> For Ye Remember, <S%G1063><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2873><s%> Our Labour <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Toil, <S%G3449><s%> <S%G3571><s%> , For Night <S%G1063><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Working, <S%G2038><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Burden <S%G1912><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Of You, <S%G5216><s%> We Proclaimed <S%G2784><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Ye Are <S%G5210><s%> Witnesses, <S%G3144><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> How <S%G5613><s%> Holily <S%G3743><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Righteously <S%G1346><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Blamelessly <S%G274><s%> With You <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> We Were : <S%G1096><s%>

Even As <S%G2509><s%> Ye Know, <S%G1492><s%> How <S%G5613><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Each One <S%G1538><s%> Of You, <S%G5216><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Father <S%G3962><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> His Own, <S%G1438><s%> Exhorting <S%G3870><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3888><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Testifying, <S%G3140><s%>

For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Have Walked <S%G4043><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Worthily <S%G516><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Calls <S%G2564><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Own <S%G1438><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Glory. <S%G1391><s%>

Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Give Thanks <S%G2168><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God <S%G2316><s%> Unceasingly, <S%G89><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Having Received The <S%G3880><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of The Report <S%G189><s%> ' By <S%G3844><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Ye Accepted <S%G1209><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Men's, <S%G444><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> Truly, <S%G230><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Works <S%G1754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Believe. <S%G4100><s%>

<S%G5210><s%> For Ye <S%G1063><s%> Imitators <S%G3402><s%> Became, <S%G1096><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Assemblies <S%G1577><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Are <S%G5607><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The Same Things <S%G5024><s%> <S%G5023><s%> Suffered <S%G3958><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> From <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Your Own <S%G2398><s%> Countrymen <S%G4853><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G846><s%> From <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Killed <S%G615><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Their Own <S%G2398><s%> Prophets, <S%G4396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Drove Out, <S%G1559><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Do Not Please, <S%G700><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> To Men <S%G444><s%> Are Contrary, <S%G1727><s%>

Forbidding <S%G2967><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> To Speak <S%G2980><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They May Be Saved, <S%G4982><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Fill Up <S%G378><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sins <S%G266><s%> Always : <S%G3842><s%> <S%G5348><s%> But Is Come <S%G1161><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wrath <S%G3709><s%> <S%G1519><s%> To The Uttermost. <S%G5056><s%>

<S%G2249><s%> But We, <S%G1161><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Having Been Bereaved <S%G642><s%> ' Of <S%G575><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Of An Hour <S%G5610><s%> In Face, <S%G4383><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> In Heart, <S%G2588><s%> More Abundantly <S%G4056><s%> Were Diligent <S%G4704><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4383><s%> Your Face <S%G5216><s%> To See <S%G1492><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Desire; <S%G1939><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> We Wished <S%G2309><s%> To Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Indeed 3303 PRT Paul, 3972 N-NSM Both 2532 CONJ Once 530 ADV And 2532 CONJ Twice, 1364 ADV And 2532 CONJ Hindered 1465 V-AAI-3S Us 2248 P-1AP 3588 T-NSM Satan; 4567 N-NSM
